channel.title: Inserting SD card?
channel.description:
Hello everyone/anyone
When inserting the micro SD card does it stay/fit as intended?
When I´m inserting my card it is more eager to turn slightly and sitting loose as well. If I´m struggling a bit, I am able to fit it in more straight forward but if I turn everything so the SD slot, I/O jacks pointing downwards (to the floor): it just falls out easily.
:confused:
/Mike

item.title: Inserting SD card?
item.dc:creator: @more_urgent_jest Jurgen
item.description:
@more_urgent_jest wrote:

would maybe be worth to put a little hint in the getting started?

Read full topic

item.title: Inserting SD card?
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

I agree that the sdcard slot is upside down, haven't heard any complaints about that.
I'm relieved that it is not a manufacturing issue I hadn't discovered yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Inserting SD card?
item.dc:creator: @miketheman Mikael Johansson
item.description:
@miketheman wrote:

That was the 'issue', had the card with wrong side up (all my cell phones have always had the labelside up, so that´s the normal way for me)...

Read full topic

item.title: Inserting SD card?
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Do you have the copper contacts of the card on the upside (label on the downside)?
The sdcard slot is supposedly pretty nice, latches when you insert it, push the card again to eject.

Read full topic
